summary: This is a calendar invitation and email correspondence regarding a preparation call for testimony in the case USA v. Ghislaine Maxwell (20 CR 330) scheduled for November 24, 2021. It details the meeting logistics for a Microsoft Teams call.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case USA v. Ghislaine Maxwell (20 CR 330). The document is related to a preparation call for testimony in her trial.

events.title: Testimony Preparation Call
events.description: A scheduled Microsoft Teams meeting for a preparation call related to testimony in the case USA v. Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: The document is a calendar invitation for a testimony preparation call in the criminal case USA v. Ghislaine Maxwell (docket 20 CR 330).
The call was scheduled for November 24, 2021, from 2:00 PM to 2:30 PM Eastern Time.
The meeting was to be conducted via Microsoft Teams, indicating remote legal proceedings or preparations.
The case reference (20 CR 330) and the defendant's name confirm this is related to the federal prosecution of Ghislaine Maxwell.
